snippet.title: Wanderer - Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter campaign:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1231806848/wanderer-2

Greenlight page:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=514749367

Wanderer is an episodic 2D adventure game blending cinematic platformer and RPG into an immersive and beautiful lo-fi sci-fi universe.

http://www.wanderer-game.com/
